ygData.subject: Re: Levels after hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Obviously - but it still doesn t account for that fact that deaths at 31 caused MUCH more xp lose than deaths at 29, 32, 33, and 34.  I haven t made it to 37.
ygData.messageBody:
Obviously - but it still doesn't account for that fact that deaths at 31
caused MUCH more xp lose than deaths at 29, 32, 33, and 34. I haven't made
it to 37.

Most of my guildmates are at about the same level as I am (or slightly
higher) and this seems to be the case for them as well...

I just lost .75 bub dying at 36. Happened at 31. Never saw a death cause
that much xp loss at ANY other levels..

Slyde in danger of losing 36...

----- Original Message -----
From: "K. Bruce Jones" <kbrucejones@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 10:30 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Levels after hell levels


> From: "K. Bruce Jones" <kbrucejones@...>
>
> Remember it takes 2-4 times the exp in the hell level. You are losing the
> same amount of exp, just looks like less because of the amount it takes to
> gain a level.
>
>
